website_summaries.verdict: Great adjustability and a compact fold-up size make this high chair a great option for those with limited space.
pros: Comes with both a full-size tray and snack tray, which works well when your baby is young
Height adjustable to fit at almost any table
Sturdy, solid build can stand up to rough toddler use
cons: The full-size tray cannot be attach to the high chair without the snack tray being in place, yet the snack tray takes both hands to remove

website_summaries.verdict: This chair keeps in step with other good high chairs on the market, though it might not be the first choice for some.
pros: The unit folds up to save space
Tray can be removed with one hand
cons: The multiple trays can be clumsy
The seat belt is tough to reach

customer_reviews.title: Great high chair!
customer_reviews.text: Don't be fooled by negative reviews...this high chair is really great. I will agree, the snack tray is annoying and kind of not needed, BUT its a small price to pay for such a nice high chair, and it IS nice for just snack time. The chair is light, easy to clean, looks nice, and doesn't take up a ton of room. Highly recommend this chair.
customer_reviews.author: BabJerm

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: I hate this chair. It's awful. The design is truly terrible. The "snack tray" is a major design flaw. My 6 month old could barely be squeezed into the seat without having to remove the snack tray first. Which would then entail removing both the regular tray AND the snack tray and then putting both back on. What is the point of the silly snack tray? I feel like whoever designed this has never actually had a kid. I've been feeding kids for 9 years. I hope Graco figures out they need to stop designing chairs like this.
customer_reviews.author: poulsbogal

customer_reviews.title: I cant figure the folding part of it but its a good chair! LOL
customer_reviews.text: Great chair. My 7 month old likes it. It can adjust lower to the ground when I'm sitting on the floor or the couch to feed her. She can sit in it and watch tv and be comfortable. I have a bistro style dining table which is higher than a normal table and the rest pulls off and has a smaller snack tray underneath and can fit nicely at the table when we eat. Fabric is easy to wipe off I just use some Lysol wipes after shes done eating and it cleans nicely. Sorry for the dirty chair pictures though I just put her in there because she was crying at me from tyoing this review haha
customer_reviews.author: MThel87

customer_reviews.title: Easy to care for!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on Amazon open box. Couldn't even tell it was opened, I was able to put it together myself fairly quickly. Directions were easy to follow, I LOVE all the features and functions of this highchair, especially since we have a counter height table. Granted, by son is still very small, but My friends have used it when over at my house, and it is VERY easy to clean, and the seat wipes off with a wet washcloth in seconds! I wish I had this highchair with my last one. Definitely saves on taking the cover off to wash all the time! I read a lot of reviews before finally purchasing this one, and I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Goldsmith

customer_reviews.title: Moves around easy on tile floor
customer_reviews.text: We are enjoying the highchair for our boy. Moves around easy on tile floor, may want one with four wheels if you have hardwood to avoid scratches. We like the removable tray insert for easy clean up. The padding cleans up easily and is maily vinal material for easy clean up in the bottom. You can just wipe out with wet towel. Be cautious with products you clean the red head rest with as it gets a little red coloring on it. Soap and water would be best. Raising up and down is good. We use it every day and the fabric and color are holding up nicely. Been using 6 months plus.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: I absolutly loooove this chair!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot congratulate myself enough for choosing this chair. It's SO practical with different hights to accomodate him to any position we need, it's easy to clean, I can put in/out my 13 month old and 22lbs son easily without ever having to remove the snack tray. It's stable and secure, also it folds easily and fits a small corner in our kitchen. It reclines too, my son has fallen asleep comfortably right there more than once. I guess I'd only advise to include 4 wheels instead of only 2, but otherwise it's everything I could hope for.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Payares

customer_reviews.title: Fits a bar hight table
customer_reviews.text: Slightly difficult to set up. They try to make it dummy proof.... but here I am. So the legs have detents that make sure the left leg goes in he left hole and such. With a little force you can make them work... but as always it shouldn’t need force. The snack tray is a little annoying how you have to remove it each time, but over all this is s nice sturdy product. I was concerned that it wouldn’t fit my bar hight table, but on the highest setting it works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: S.R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Our Needs
customer_reviews.text: We love this high chair. We didn't get it until our baby was old enough to sit up on his own, but the shoulder harnesses are the best thing ever with a wiggly child who doesn't just sit there and eat his food. We loved the reclining seat when he was just starting solids and also the height adjustment. We don't travel with this one at all since it is bulky. The chair is still bulky when the legs are folded up, but it stays out of our way when we're not using it. It's super easy to clean, which has also been nice.
customer_reviews.author: J. Small

customer_reviews.title: Best high chair
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that this is adjustable by height and has three different options for no tray, small tray, and large tray all of which easily remove. Also, main reason i purchased it was the fact it can be folded up and stored to the side for a small kitchen. It is very comfy for my 8 month old and he likes to just sit and play in it while I clean the kitchen. Very sturdy even when he rocks back and forth and plays.
customer_reviews.author: carlee

customer_reviews.title: Look for a different one
customer_reviews.text: It was missing tools the first time it was sent, they sent another one but I hated that I have already set up before I realized that. I needed to take it down and return. The tray attached to the chair broke fairly quickly, in less than a year. While I could still attach it, I don’t feel confident placing food on top or it might fall.
customer_reviews.author: HD

customer_reviews.title: I like this high chair so far
customer_reviews.text: I like this high chair so far. The only thing I'd change is putting wheels on the front. I like to have baby near the dinner table but he likes movement. With my old Graco I would use my foot to move it back & forth. This one is harder to do because of the lack of front wheels. Now he doesn't fall asleep because it's jerky instead of smooth. I kept it because most high chairs in this price range don't have wheels at all & I needed something with them.
customer_reviews.author: Cracklin' Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Easy assy. People complaining about legs...
customer_reviews.text: ...have the legs backward. Bit concerning that people aren't bright enough to turn the legs around. I didn't crack the little assembly book, took about 10 minutes including getting a Philips for the 2 screws, stuffing berries in my mouth and taking the cardboard out to the garage. Don't pay attention to the bad reviews about assy., they're from people that can't insert tab 'a' into slot 'b'. Literally
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Overall not bad for your money.
customer_reviews.text: When I received the first one, I thought it was broken to due to having grooves in the legs that made it seem impossible to assemble. Called customer service and sent out another one that I received the following morning. Assembling was a giant pain in the rear! Overall not too bad but connecting one of the legs has like a groove in it to where you have to force it to click in, needless to say it was a pain. The chair is a bit bigger than I had imagined but my son so far loved it and I like how easy it is to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lysnicole6

customer_reviews.title: Works. Not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Easy to Assemble Easy to Use - the tray comes off and on easily. Versatile (can use instead of a booster seat later on) I like the tray "liner" CONS: Difficult to clean! It takes 5-10 minutes to get the padding off (and the straps have to be completely removed) Tacky - the "gray" pictured is more like a shiny star-trek silver Bulky - I was not expecting it to be so large SUMMARY: I really wanted a simple, compact chair, but I fell victim to all the features this boasts. I would have preferred a simple wooden chair, but apparently simple is more expensive?
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: This is a great high chair
customer_reviews.text: This is a great high chair. I bought it for grandmas house. It stores easily, it looks comfortable and you can use it traditionally or easily pull it right up to the table. We have the graco slim spaces which is great but a pain to clean daily as it's fabric. This being plastic is like the slim spaces but easier to clean. Though it does take up slightly more room then the slim spaces when storing it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Angelo

customer_reviews.title: we like this high chair
customer_reviews.text: Overall, we like this high chair. The colors are great and it cleans easy. The one complaint I have is the floor guards on the back legs. They are riveted on. One came off almost immediately. We didn't want to hassle with mailing it back and thought we could glue it or get a new one from Graco. Well they have been out of stock for over a month. This tells me it is a common problem with the back legs. My granddaughter has just started figuring out she can rock the high chair with the uneven legs. Hopefully we will be able to get the replacement part, and then we will really like the high chair again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: Love the wipe able surface of the chair padding. Looks great. Folds up nicely. Assembly is a snap! (Couldn't resist that one) reviews I read were spot on only I'd suggest that with larger babies either recline the seat back to slide them under the snack tray or remove it (a pain) each time. But plenty of room once they're in. I prefer reclining the back then sit it up once they're in. Simple. Doesn't slide up to the tall tables with the square bases because of the legs but most everywhere else should be able to. Really like it so far.
customer_reviews.author: M.E.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.... I love it
customer_reviews.text: My 7-month old grandson fits perfectly in this highchair. The straps are not so tight that he cant move his arms, there are no protruding gadgets,etc for him to hurt himself on and he is able to sit up well in it. Also I like the slanted legs because I dont want to have to worry, as he gets older, that he may push his feet against the kitchen table and fall backwards. Oh and having the choice of the smaller snack tray or the full size one is a great option.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie89

customer_reviews.title: Great high chair for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Great high chair for the cost. The tray is huge, my 8 month old can't reach all the way to the end of it yet. Mine came with indents in the legs nd I literally had to use a rubber mallet to pound the legs together, but that was easier than returning it/ calling graco as others have done. That is why it doesn't get 5 stars from me. My baby is very chunkyand he fits just fine into it even though the snack tray doesn't come off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely highchair
customer_reviews.text: I love this highchair. I enjoy the adjustable height, chair can easily be used at countertop island, dining table, or in tv room. Easy to clean with damp cloth. Using the smaller snack tray in order to use larger tray has not been an issue for us, very simple. Cons: Hard to open chair up if you're holding baby. There is no place to store tray when not in use. Baby has learned to snap extra tray layer off of larger tray.
customer_reviews.author: L.Bond.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this highchair. It's easy to clean, love the height adjustments, looks nice, smaller foot print. I love the snack tray. I have no trouble getting my 26 pound baby in and out without taking the snack tray off
customer_reviews.author: LuLu

customer_reviews.title: I love it! I love how easily the top tray ...
customer_reviews.text: We've been using ours for the past 2 weeks. I love it! I love how easily the top tray pops off, and that you can throw it in the dish washer. The chair is so comfortable, and as an added bonus, the red/grey color combo even matches our kitchen! I read a comment earlier about how to take your baby out/in the high chair- just adjust the seat all the way back, and presto! Baby can slide in and out easily!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, comfortable and easy to adjust tray.  Will adjust as child grows.
customer_reviews.text: After having reviewed high chairs and checked locally, I took a chance on ordering this one. Easy to fit tray, good support with comfortable padding, fits my 5 month old granddaughter and will adjust as she grows, sturdy and comfortable. Lunch and dinner time are most enjoyable!
customer_reviews.author: L. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had a better seating design
customer_reviews.text: I would of gave it 5 stars if it wasnt for the seat design. I have to make sure im holding my baby when strapping her in so she doesn't slide down because the seat is at a slant. I wish she could sit back more into the seat rather than look like she is leaning forward. Also is alot bigger than expected. I am wondering whether I should have bought the slim spaces instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A fine high chair!
customer_reviews.text: We first had a high chair that didn't fold and needed a fold-able one for RV traveling. This is a wonderful chair. It's sturdy, easy to clean, tray is the right height and size and we were able to store it away neatly in the closet. We've done away with the old chair and now only use this one. We never use the insert of the tray because you end up cleaning both anyway. LO climbs in and out by himself for dinner and playing with playdough, kinetic sand and crafts.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Good economical chair
customer_reviews.text: Good chair. We only use the snack tray and shes 18 months old. Will upgrade to the full tray soon. I just don't like having to have the snack tray in before you can put the full tray on.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love it. This high chair is wonderful! I have 11 month old twins. At six months my husband bought the "space saver" chairs.... Save your money and pay $20 more for this chair!!!! Three reasons: 1) it folds 2) several different heights which I love, and 3) it reclines oh and it's Very easy to clean! It technically has three trays all of which are removed easily. Baby loves it and I wish I had two! The space saver chairs are horrible if you don't have a place to store them and good sturdy chairs. I highly recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: Rlwhite0624

customer_reviews.title: It'S not broken!!!
customer_reviews.text: Once i started putting the chair togueter i found out that one of the legs was aparently broken, it has a piece of metal that blocks the entry of the base.. I checked the reviews and it Also happened to others!! So i got ready with my hammer and my tools thinking it was broken but my wife Found out i had put the legs wrong. Once i changed the leg to the other side it slides perfectly. So put away your blowtorch! Just Change the legs from left to Right anda you are all set i Believe graco made it this way so you put the legs in the Right place. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Fernández López

customer_reviews.title: Was super sad bought 2 of these as gifts and both ...
customer_reviews.text: Was super sad bought 2 of these as gifts and both had issues. I had high hopes for these chairs after the great reviews. I bought them as gifts and within a week one of the straps broke on one and a month into use the other one had padding rip and for the money I spent on not one but 2 of these I expected more.
customer_reviews.author: Missme

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the quality of this high chair. It wasn't as hard to assemble as some reviewers have mentioned, especially if you watch the video online. I find it very easy to clean too. The only drawback is that my daughter bruises her legs against the high chair table. I think that is a design flaw. I get around this by removing the table completely. All in all I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mrinalini Verma

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this highchair
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this highchair. I got this for my 6 month old son, it was time to start introducing solids and I wanted something with many height adjustments. The color is almost a silvery gray and red. I like that the cover is able to be wiped clean. The base is rather wide, but that's okay with me when considering it has pretty much every feature I wanted. The back has 3 reclining angels, this has 8 heights and the foot rest is also adjustable. I would completely recommend this tablefit high chair.
customer_reviews.author: EmmaUnderground

customer_reviews.title: Almost...
customer_reviews.text: They should have done a better job with the section that goes between the legs below the tray. While it's perfect for the little one, it's too tight (not hight enough) for the 2 years old's legs to fit through easily. There's a screen you can remove to make this easier, but it is not easy enough to do this quickly and so I can't reuse this seat for these two different aged kids.
customer_reviews.author: HowardP

customer_reviews.title: Tablefit highchair
customer_reviews.text: The tablefit highchair is a great way to bring baby right up to the table with the rest of the family. I also use the highchair when I am cooking or washing dishes and baby wants to watch. Wheels make it possible to move her about while she's still strapped in for a better vantage point. Easily adjusts, comfortable for baby. Wish we had this from day one. Really truly reclines. One of the few baby "essentials" that I really enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Momma-roo

customer_reviews.title: Good Product but misleading color
customer_reviews.text: This arrived very quickly and was a great price for what you get. 5 month old loves it and can now see me in the kitchen and join us at the table. The reason I only gave it 4 stars is the misleading color. I ordered the red/gray chair (finley) and the gray is actually very shiny, like vinyl, kind of flashy/vegas looking, not at all like the gray in the picture (which I thought was matte). The baby looks like he is at a card game sometimes, although it is good for wipeing down I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Mali

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I am happy so far with this highchair. Love the material and very lightweight but sturdy. Also like that I can pull him up to the table to eat. The only issue I am seeing is when my son gets bigger, there is a center piece that is separately attached, that keeps kids from sliding out, but his thighs are already pretty wedged in there, so I will have to remove the tray, then this center piece just to get him out. I think it must be a special feature of this "table fit" chair. Kind of a hassle. Still a great buy and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Soave

customer_reviews.title: Great highchair
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this highchair! Had to buy a new one after our 3rd was born. I like the fact that this is height adjustable, so we can raise or lower the baby to sit at the right height for the table she is sitting at. This works great for both our kitchen table and even lowers to the right height for her to sit at the kid's play table that we will pull into the kitchen when we have people over. It is pretty easy to clean and folds up so we can put it out of the way, when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best highchair on the market.
customer_reviews.text: My one year old son absolutely loves his new highchair. This thing is awesome. It reclines so it's super easy to put him in, or get him out. Also the reclining is awesome for him because after he is done eating he likes to kick back with a sippy cup and hang out at the table with Mom and Dad. The buckles are easy to snap and unsnap. (For me, not him). Everything about this product is top notch. Thanks, and keep up the good work.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Easy clean, fairly easy assembly ( just two screws-the rest is snap together). I wish only it was more compact when it folded together. Not crazy about the front button seat belt. It's hard to work pushing and pulling at the same time with arthritic fingers. Nice big removable tray and attached smaller snack tray. Works great at the table too.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri S.

customer_reviews.title: Love the multiple adjustable heights on this seat
customer_reviews.text: Love the multiple adjustable heights on this seat. Wish the seat belt clips were easier to take in and out. You also can't fold up the chair and store it. It folds but does not stay that way. Still my favorite high chair over the years.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nash

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited when I ordered this, but once I put it together my excitement turned to disappointment. This is not as sturdy as it looks. It is also very difficult to roll around. The only redeeming thing about it is the snack tray, the adjustable foot rest, and there is no center post when the trays are off. It has been reduced to a backup at my parents house while we use the 10 year old evenflow my best friend gave us, that I don't think you can even get anymore. But it is in better shape then this brand new one.
customer_reviews.author: glori

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a friend based on her registry. It looked as it does in the picture but can't speak to the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy A

customer_reviews.title: Going back ASAP
customer_reviews.text: This is not the quality of Graco products I've come to love. The fabric is extremely cheap, almost the fabric of a poncho you'd buy at a sporting event. The one we got was warped & after an hour of trying the easy assembly, we gave up & it's back in the box to go back tomorrow. I'm just going to spend a little more & get something better. We had a Graco high chair with our first son 4 years ago & LOVED it. This is one of the cheapest made things I've ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Mixed Feelings
customer_reviews.text: This high chair is good quality - what you would expect from Graco. What I don't understand, though, is that on one hand the design has excellent flexibility in height adjustment to align with a kitchen table or with a counter top or with a child's table,etc. Makes the chair useful for children up to 2 or 3 years old. On the other hand, the plastic guard that fits between the child's legs to keep him from falling out has no adjustment ability at all and is already becoming too tight for our 11 month old grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Sherlock Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Great high chair...tough to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Overall, an excellent high chair. Very very easy to clean. A wet paper towel is all we use and it is clean. The only down side is the difficulty we had to assemble. We were literally stepping on it. We have twins, so the first one was so difficult, we nearly returned it, but managed to get it together. The second one went much easier as i used my stepping method and it went together much faster. The folding and height adjustment features are great. Would def recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ankurbs

customer_reviews.title: Prefer our graco blossom but I still like this one a lot.
customer_reviews.text: I had 2 kids really close in age. We have a graco blossom but I wanted something for my daughter that would also fold up against the wall. I don't feel like this is as strong and sturdy as the blossom but that's what you get when the legs move to flatten it.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Great High Chair for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: I like the wipe-able fabric on the edges of the chair. Makes it much easier to clean! My baby is 9 months old and weighs 22 pounds. She fits just fine in the chair. It doesn't take up too much room in our kitchen, and it's easy to get her in and out of. Assembly was easy, only 2 screws and the rest was snap together. I like that it is even with our dining room table so she can be a part of the dinnertime routine. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Kac52b

customer_reviews.title: This is truly a wonderful high chair
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a wonderful high chair! The only down fall to it is that there is no place to put the table too part when not in use and that gets annoying quickly. Otherwise I love all the other features.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, affordable highchair
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice high chair for our 8 month old. It didn't take long for my husband to put together and I really like the red and gray color and design. The tray is funvtional and the top part comes out and is easy to clean. My only negative is the buckles, I'm not too satisfied with the design. Overall very good!
customer_reviews.author: SALI2011

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for Grandparents home.
customer_reviews.text: This was the first product we purchased from the warehouse. What a wonderful highchair. The saving was excellent, nothing was missing, the box was securely taped. We now check the warehouse first before shopping for large items. Thanks Amazon for passing on such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Augustie

customer_reviews.title: It will do
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together. It is sturdy but I can say it is a cheap one. We have an expensive model my older daughter still uses. We just wanted use this till older one grows out of high chair. So it will do.
customer_reviews.author: Cheetos

customer_reviews.title: But its perfect. Started with LO at 5 months intro to ...
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a discontinued brand now. But its perfect. Started with LO at 5 months intro to solids and now he is 16 months no problems. I can remove tray and snack bar to have him at table but not ready yet. More food on floor and he's a mess but I guess he will just learn and me be patient. And thats whats great! Easy to clean, wash the tray and wipe down plastic/pleather seat cover. You can adjust height easy. I have no space problem so no need to stow away
customer_reviews.author: VC

customer_reviews.title: Good Chair at Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these chairs that are replacing some we have had for over ten years in our infant child care business. These chairs are easily adjustable and the well padded, two piece chair covers are plastic and easily cleanable. In addition the seats are attractively designed. One negative feature is the spacing between the table support frame and the seat back make it a tight squeeze in placing children, especially toddlers, into the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: its a great value for money!!
customer_reviews.text: i love this highchair!! my 9month daughter feels comfortable as the seat is bigger and more comfortable. the seat reclines so it becomes easier for me to feed her bottle too. there are 8 levels to which the height can be adjusted, we can have a family dinner together, she sits in it at our counter top and has her snacks while i finish my daily chores. the snack table size is apt and the entire highchair is simply easy to clean.. yess the trays are dishwasher safe! and the seat cover is machine washable!. overall its a great buy as i dont need to worry about changing it as my baby grows..
customer_reviews.author: Anand R.

customer_reviews.title: We love this. Watch the video about the pushing up ...
customer_reviews.text: We love this. Watch the video about the pushing up to the table, height adjust, recline...perfect for teaching little ones to eat. We just got ours in and the trays are very easy to take off! Folds up and stands in the corner great. How awesome that it is sturdy and folds out of the way. Rolls around pretty easy to on our carpet. Definitely buy. I wish we would have had it with our first!
customer_reviews.author: Tb

customer_reviews.title: Our baby loves and it even folds up for easy storage!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time and the 2 trays it comes with are an added plus. It's easy to clean. The drawings on the directions weren't great. The assembly took longer than anticipated because of this. Otherwise it's great.
customer_reviews.author: leolady

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and folds down nicely! Loving it so far. I'm using this for my 4 month old even though she has not started solids yet. I wanted something she could sit in while hanging out in the kitchen. The reclining options are great- especially for a young baby. She fits great in the harness now and it's easily adjustable as she grows. Excited to get more use out of it when she's ready to start foods!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: better than more expensive ones.
customer_reviews.text: fit toddler great and easier to clean than our more expensive high chair, very strong and works well and secure. No need to buy more expensive high chairs, very soft and comfortable for the little ones.Soft head support.
customer_reviews.author: Pilot

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, but not so easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: This highchair is very easy to clean and I like the fact that it has a snack tray. I also like that it reclined back so that my son could lay and drink his milk in it, as well. It was a little annoying to assemble, compared to another highchair that I bought for my parent's house. The wheels are nice to move it around, but not too mobile to the point where it constantly slides around on a non-carpeted floor. I love the red and grey colour too. I wouldn't consider the difficulty in assembly as a drawback, just something to take under consideration when you're browsing for chairs. I would recommend this chair to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Shoaib Shakeel

customer_reviews.title: She seems pretty happy in there
customer_reviews.text: This high chair is a lot more bulky than others and scratches wood floors. I definitely wish i would have bought a different model. I left 2 stars for the comfort of my baby though. She seems pretty happy in there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile
customer_reviews.text: We used this with our first grandchild. We had an issue with the snack tray, the company handled our issue to our satisfaction. Using it with our second grandchild.
customer_reviews.author: Grandmomma

customer_reviews.title: Good useful high chair.
customer_reviews.text: Love the ability to adjust the seat height on the fly. When it collapses, it will store nicely against a wall or in the corner.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair.
customer_reviews.text: Great chair. Pleasant surprise to realise the legs fold shut for easy upright storage. Not quite a fan of the snap in snack tray. I worry about pinching my little guy in there. Otherwise, easy assembly, great look, easy to strap in a kid. Very happy I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Friskit

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about it!
customer_reviews.text: I love how easily and how much you can adjust the height of this chair, also when you fold it up it stands on its own even with the trays attached. The straps are very easy to adjust and love the multiple trays which you can remove with one hand. The fabric is like a waterproof material and wipes off really easily. I'm really glad I went with this high chair.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlei Cogley

customer_reviews.title: easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, easy to adjust, great to be able to fold up without removing the chair. I did A LOT of research, and this one was the best! And it's actual use holds up to expectations. Easy to clean, easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Jamy Foo

customer_reviews.title: We love this highchair
customer_reviews.text: We love this highchair! It's so nice that you can adjust the seat. You can bring it all the way down so they're level with your chair at the table, and you can lay it back too. It's vinyl so it's super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Great high chair
customer_reviews.text: Great high chair. Easy to clean and comfortable for my baby. Only difficulty in assembling was putting the legs on - we used a little Pam spray (or you could use WD40) to help slide the two pieces together and then it was easy!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Still in use. Quality product as usual from grace. Highly recommend it. My child 2 still use it.
customer_reviews.author: Affan Khan

customer_reviews.title: Should be great for wiping spills
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is actually a vinyl, pleather-like material. Should be great for wiping spills, but it's kind of ugly. The chair seems sturdy and I like the snack tray for letting my son chill out in the kitchen with me while I cook. I like that there is a little divider between the legs, it holds him in there. Overall i think it will be a good chair for the price.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Works in small apartment!
customer_reviews.text: Love this highchair! We have a small apartment and it folds up so easy..plus as she grows she just sit at the table with us up close and personal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! It's easy to clean and my son must be pretty comfortable, he's falling asleep in it several times. That may be why they added the recline feature. The only thing I don't care for is having to put the small try on before you can us the top tray. I don't use the top tray beer option yet, but this high chair will grow with him. It's with the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Jadista

customer_reviews.title: He is very comfortable in it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my great-grandson's first birthday. Very well made. He is very comfortable in it. Adjustments are really helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Leni

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very smart engineering piece!! Very satisfied and our baby loves playing on it, very comfy and safe!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jasur

customer_reviews.title: GREAT HIGH CHAIR INFANT TO TODDLER
customer_reviews.text: This high chair proved a great buy. It is easily adjustable for height not only for the infant but also in relation to an adjoining table. The seat back adjusts effortlessly for an upright position as the baby gets older or reclined when they are in infancy. Very good materials that easy to wipe clean. It was the right choice.
customer_reviews.author: George Zawacki

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It's easy to put together, easy to clean, you can adjust it one handed while holding your infant. The 5 point harness adjusts so easily and fits my really tiny baby. It's pricey compared to some of the others but it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather R. Blain

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to keep clean
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to keep clean. I love the height adjustability and the different recline options. Totally worth the money. The only negative thing for me is that I have hard wood floors and if you don't really lift up on the chairs front wheels, it leaves scratch marks; so just dont drag it. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This highchair is exactly what we were looking for!! It's easy to clean and easy to use. The different heights and recline positions have been so helpful. We took the buckles off for now (I know, not recommended) as there is a piece that sits between the legs so she can't fall through. We will of course, put the buckles back on when we stop using the tray and just pull her up to the table. Definitely recommend this highchair.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Great High Chair
customer_reviews.text: After searching for many high chairs, I purchased this one and extremely happy! It is very easy to clean and fits my chunkers comfortably! I love the reclining feature! Very good high chair!!
customer_reviews.author: Emilio Pages

customer_reviews.title: Great high chair!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Adjustable heights comes in handy. Love the reclining feature for when she’s drinking her bottle. I’ve got a chunky baby and she fits fine.
customer_reviews.author: Gene B

customer_reviews.title: Nice highchair
customer_reviews.text: Great highchair. I got this for our granddaughter to use at out house. Love how it can be adjusted up and down. Removable tray insert is great for clean up. It does have the snack tray that has to be removed to get her in and out but that is not a big deal to me.
customer_reviews.author: pc2425

customer_reviews.title: Graco Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very adjustable. Easy to remove tray. Reclines. Folds up. This is well made and well designed. It's kinda big but that isn't an issue.
customer_reviews.author: J. J. Moe

customer_reviews.title: Are they kidding me
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this chair and first I was disappointed in the material on the seat, its plastic. I know it will clean easy but I prefer cloth that I can put in the washer. It was so huge and clumsy. you have to put on two trays, one is when the child is older but you need to put this on to get the larger tray on. We retured it in two days.
customer_reviews.author: Crazyjaney

customer_reviews.title: Best baby chair ever!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful chair. Easy to sssemble msnuvers well. Very easy to manipulate with one hand. Extremely easy to clean. Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret P. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Average chair
customer_reviews.text: I liked the color of the chair. Since it's for my grandchild, I don't have it out all of the time. I wish when it was folded up it didn't take up so much space.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Cona

customer_reviews.title: I love the different levels which makes the highchair usable in ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a second high chair to take to work. I love the different levels which makes the highchair usable in many different places. Also love the snack tray for just crackers or light snacks without the huge tray.
customer_reviews.author: Becca0314

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic buy!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this high chair. It is very easy to clean and I love how the top is two pieces. It rolls around my kitchen easily and the different height levels are great for different tables and crafts. My little one even plays piano sitting in this chair. The only thing I would do to make it a better product is create a tray that is the durability of a cutting board. I tend to cut her food up on the tray. Realized it left marks too late :-) Still a fantastic buy and will definitely use with our second child!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Love this high chair and it's features
customer_reviews.text: Love this high chair and it's features. My only complaint is the seat cover and back rest is a vinyl material. It's great for cleaning but my infant sweats really bad in it :(
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect high chair!
customer_reviews.text: I did my research in order to buy the right high chair for my 6 month old baby girl. This one is perfect. Her legs are not hanging which was one of the things I was looking for. The tray can be adjusted so the baby can be comfy. Will definitely recomend this one. Great price, light weight and my baby loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Elsy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Extra comfortable for GBaby and the removable tray top saves so much clean up time when she's less messy. Love the back wheels, so easy to move.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Nemelka

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with the purchase of the Graco TableFit Highchair
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the purchase of the Graco TableFit Highchair. As I write this, my daughter is almost 7 months old, and it fits her well. Easy to get her in and out with the removable tray and no need to worry about her squiggling out as there is a 5-point/3-point harness. Love the ability to raise or lower it to multiple heights, as well as it's portability around the kitchen with the front wheels. Material is pleasant to the touch and wipes up easily. Good construction and good price for a solid product!
customer_reviews.author: T. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Stuck
customer_reviews.text: This was convenient and fun at first but the clasp that locks the baby in got stuck. I could not get by baby girl out of the chair. Finally managed to get one side is the clasp open to get her out. Other side is still in the locked position. Horrible experience! The clasp feels like a really cheap plastic part.
customer_reviews.author: Viki Z

customer_reviews.title: ... new 8 month old grandson and it is very nice in its adjustments
customer_reviews.text: Have used it many times with my new 8 month old grandson and it is very nice in its adjustments; and the trays are real easy to put on and take off. The under tray needs a few times to loosen up before it becomes pretty easy to take off but after a little wear in it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am more than satisfied with this chair
customer_reviews.text: I am more than satisfied with this chair. It works wonderful for me and for my baby. He feel comfortable in it and like staying for some time after finishing eating.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Shk

customer_reviews.title: Love the reclining!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our small home. Love having him at the table!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great features, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great high chair for the price! (Got on sale plus an extra 20% off Graco at checkout, paid $65 with tax) I bought this high chair over others because of the adjustable height, dishwasher safe tray, 3 position reclining, and because it is made to slide right up to the table. The tray has been through the dishwasher a time or two and the cover has been through the washing machine and held up great! We previously had a chicco high chair and I would say this one is very comparable and would be the obvious choice given I purchased it for about half the price!
customer_reviews.author: Staci Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great.
customer_reviews.text: Super cozy . A little bulky /awkward to store but for our use and space it's perfect. So soft and cozy, and cleans easily.
customer_reviews.author: loktai

customer_reviews.title: Great highchair with on flaw.
customer_reviews.text: Good highchair but very hard to move around. It has wheels but they are mounted so you can't easily pull or push it. Pretty much have to carry it to where you want it. Other then that it's sturdy, should last a long time. My 6 month old grandson is very secure in it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Navarre

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just right for Grandma to have on hand when my grandchild comes.
customer_reviews.author: julieh

customer_reviews.title: reliable chair
customer_reviews.text: very reliable chair. bought this for quite some time. no problems at all. my niece loves this the first time she sat on this chair. she even fall asleep because its quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: jo paulo cruz

customer_reviews.title: Use at DINNER TABLE or with tray!
customer_reviews.text: It's so nice to have the option to use this with the tray or right at the dinner table with the family. We liked it so much that we bought 2, one for home and one for Grandma's house. It also stores well because it stands flat when tray is removed! Very nice and reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaholic

customer_reviews.title: Great Highchair
customer_reviews.text: I love this highchair because of all the great features and the fact that my son can feel like part of the family during meal time also. It's so easy to clean I would have given it 10 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: R.R.

product_meta.title: Graco Table Fit Finley High Chair, Red/Brown
product_meta.description:
Your new little one is a big part of the family, so why not start a tradition of family mealtimes, right from the beginning? Graco's TableFit Highchair does just that. The Graco high chair's ingenious design properly positions your child right to the table and is designed to fit a variety of tables, from dining room tables to kitchen tables to kitchen countertops. The gently sloping front of the highchair and special tray means that your child can be at the table's edge, unobstructed by a bulky tray or frame. The TableFit is designed to suit your child from the earliest meals. As a new baby, your child will be positioned correctly for early bottle feedings, thanks to the 3-position recline. Then, as baby grows, you can adjust to a more upright position. Plus, this highchair has an infant body support that keeps babies comfy and supported from the start. Then, it removes as your child needs more room. You'll love the 1-hand removable dishwasher-safe tray, so you can get your child in and out of the chair with just one hand. The adjustable footrest keeps your child comfortable as he/she grows and makes it easy for you to find the right position. When you're not using your TableFit Highchair, it easily folds, so that you can store it. It slides compactly into to a closet until the next mealtime. Safety is always your first priority when it comes to your child, so you'll feel great about the convertible 3- and 5-point harness, which keeps your little one secure. The 3-position reclining seat makes this high chair perfect for early mealtimes. The seat pad features wipe-clean fabrics that are also machine washable. TableFit has 8 height positions, so you can adjust it to suit your table. A handy snack tray is included for quick and easy versatility.

BRAND STORY
By Graco
feature_bullets: Toddler highchair slides right up to the table for a perfect fit
Adjust the body support and harness with one hand
Baby highchair has 8 height positions to help make feeding easier
Compact fold allows for easy storage
Wipeable and machine-washable seat pad makes cleanup quick and easy *Infant body support and 3-position recline keep baby comfortable for early feedings

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars570 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
